Discover the legends of ancient China. Chaos has captured many gods, and only a true hero can save the world from catastrophe.

In case group of 5 or more tokens contains bonuse - this bonuse will be powered-up.

Tap a group of two or more identical chips to remove them.
Your number of moves on the level is limited.
Remove a group of 5 or more chips to get a bonus.
Remove the chips to make a bonus appear in a group of chips of the same color.
The Bomb bonus destroys all nearby stones and chips when it explodes.
If the bonus lands in a group of 5 or more chips, it becomes a super bonus.
If a group of chips has 2 or more bonuses in it, they combine into a super bonus.
The plates break when a chip is removed on them.
Break all the plates to complete the level.
Stones break when chips are removed next to them.
Lower all the vases to the bottom to complete the level.
To break the chain, you need to remove the chip behind it.
You can smash a stone by removing a chip of the same color next to it.
The icy piece freezes all the surrounding chips. Frozen chips can be freed up by combining them in a group.
Pan's Feather bonus. Adds 5 additional moves to the level.
Magical Fan bonus. Removes all chips of a single color on the level.
Bunch of fireworks bonus edds 3 more bombs on the field.
New bonus available: White Tiger Whirlwind. Tap the icon to purchase it.
Activate the bonus by tapping the icon.
New bonus available: Azure Dragon's Blessing. Tap the icon to purchase it.
Activate the bonus by tapping the icon.
New bonus available: Golden Dragon's Breath. Tap the icon to purchase it.
Activate the bonus by tapping the icon.
Greetings, stranger! Your arrival fills our hearts with hope.
The ancient Chaos is devouring the house of the gods, and even I, the all-seeing Goddess of Wind, am powerless to stop it. All around us will turn to stone if a savior does not come.
The oracle said that we will know our hero by the artifact in his hands. Right now, the artifact is guarded by the Goddesses of Time in the temple beyond the mountain.
Let us go get it right now! You may be the very one sent to save us.
You got to the temple! But will the goddesses give you the artifact or will they incinerate you on the spot, annoyed by your impudence?

The gods favor you! But the artifact will show its power only in the hands of the chosen one. In other hands, it will turn to stone. Soon we will discover whether or not you can revive this ancient power.
Now the artifact will serve only your will.
We're about to find out if you were the one the oracle spoke of! Touch the God of the Hearth, and let the artifact either destroy his bonds or turn itself to stone!
You saved the God of the Hearth! But now the artifact, our last hope, is destroyed.

This is not the end, Goddess of Wind. Chaos was simply stronger than we thought. Fortunately, the first you saved was one with the power to repair the artifact. But I'm going to need a few items to do so.
Very well. While I kindle the furnace, bring me all I need for my work.
I am beginning to believe more and more that a prophesied hero stands before us. Thanks to your resourcefulness, we've found all the items we need.
The prophecy is coming true! And now, give me the artifact.
The God of the Hearth has no equal in blacksmithing! How can we thank you for your work?
My heart aches with worry for my spouse, the Goddess of Love. Chaos most likely sealed her in stone as well. She must be eager for rescue.
But my limp won't allow me to go in search of her as I would wish to!
We'll find her, whatever the cost.
Adds 5 additional moves to the level.
Adds 15 additional seconds to the level.
Removes all chips of a single color from play at the start of the level.
Removes several columns of chips from play.
Removes several rows of chips from play.
